title: 8:00 am – 5:00 pm — Registration & Move In (New & Returning Students)
body: Register and move in; new day students recommended after 11:00 am. Parents: coffee/chat in Wrestling Room (by Hahn). Location: William Boyce Thompson Field House, Chadwick Lane.

title: 11:30 am – 1:30 pm — Lunch with Families & Lion Mascot
body: Enjoy lunch and a DJ. Locations: Elm Street and New Dining Halls.

title: 1:15 – 1:35 pm — New Day Students & Families Meet
body: Meet Day Student Coordinator Jennifer Manx Asch. Location: EPAC, Day Student Lounge, 2nd floor.

title: 1:45 – 2:15 pm — Adviser Meetings
body: New boarders/day students meet advisers; locations sent by email.

title: 2:30 – 3:00 pm — Dorm Meet & Greet for Families
body: Meet your dorm team in the dorm’s common room.

title: 3:15 – 3:45 pm — New Students Meet Proctors
body: Introductions and dorm tour in dorm common rooms.

title: 3:15 – 3:45 pm — Principal’s Welcome for New Parents
body: Remarks from Principal Rawson and Academy leaders. Location: Goel Center, Mainstage.

title: 4:00 – 5:30 pm — Parent/Guardian Welcome Reception
body: Light refreshments and fellowship; visiting siblings welcome. Location: Thompson Field House, Wrestling Room, 2nd floor.

title: 5:00 – 7:00 pm — Student/Advisory BBQ & Back-to-School Party
body: On McConnell Lawn; adviser will share meet-up details.

title: 7:00 – 7:45 pm — Academy Basics (Preps @ Grainger, Lowers @ Love Gym) — REQUIRED
body: Session with the Dean of Students Office.

title: 8:00 – 8:45 pm — Academy Basics (Uppers @ Grainger, Seniors @ Love Gym) — REQUIRED
body: Session with the Dean of Students Office.

title: 9:15 – 10:00 pm — Required Dorm Meetings
body: All boarders and dorm affiliates; optional for day student affiliates.
